statements: UPDATE palm_vein_recognition SET recognition_result = true WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE palm_vein_recognition SET attendance_timestamp = '2022-10-20 08:30:15' WHERE user_id = 5;
UPDATE palm_vein_recognition SET recognition_result = TRUE, attendance_timestamp = '2022-01-01 09:00:00' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE palm_vein_recognition SET palm_vein_data = E'\\xDEADBEEF', recognition_result = FALSE WHERE user_id = 5;
UPDATE user_profiles SET first_name = 'John', last_name = 'Doe' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE palm_vein_results SET result_date = '2022-09-30 08:00:00', palm_vein_data = 'FFAABBCC'::BYTEA WHERE user_id = 2;
UPDATE user_profiles SET first_name='Alice', last_name='Johnson' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE palm_vein_results SET palm_vein_data=decode('87654321ABCD', 'hex') WHERE user_id=2;
UPDATE palm_vein_recognition_results SET palm_vein_data = 'data_updated' WHERE user_id = 1
UPDATE attendance_tracking SET check_in_time = '2022-10-12 08:00:00' WHERE user_id = 3
UPDATE palm_vein_recognition_results SET palm_vein_data = 'xyz123' WHERE user_id = 123
UPDATE user_profiles SET full_name = 'John Doe', email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE user_id = 456
UPDATE user_profiles SET user_name = 'John Doe' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE attendance_records SET attendance_status = 'Present' WHERE user_id = 3;
UPDATE user_profiles SET user_name = 'John Doe' WHERE user_id = 101;
UPDATE attendance_records SET attendance_status = 'Present' WHERE user_id = 102 AND attendance_date = '2022-01-15';
UPDATE palm_vein_results SET vein_pattern = 'New Pattern' WHERE user_id = 101;
UPDATE attendance_records SET time_in = '08:30:00', time_out = '17:30:00' WHERE user_id = 202;
UPDATE palm_vein_results SET vein_pattern = 'New Pattern', date_time = '2022-09-01 10:00:00' WHERE user_id = 101;
UPDATE user_profiles SET email = 'john.doe@example.com', department = 'HR' WHERE user_id = 202;
